memberdef.name: FIFOTHR
memberdef.initializer: 0x03 /* FIFOTHR - RX FIFO and TX FIFO thresholds */

memberdef.name: FREQ2
memberdef.initializer: 0x0D /* FREQ2 - Frequency control word, high byte */

memberdef.name: FREQ1
memberdef.initializer: 0x0E /* FREQ1 - Frequency control word, middle byte */

memberdef.name: FREQ0
memberdef.initializer: 0x0F /* FREQ0 - Frequency control word, low byte */

memberdef.name: MCSM2
memberdef.initializer: 0x16 /* MCSM2 - Main Radio Control State Machine configuration */

memberdef.name: MCSM1
memberdef.initializer: 0x17 /* MCSM1 - Main Radio Control State Machine configuration */

memberdef.name: MCSM0
memberdef.initializer: 0x18 /* MCSM0 - Main Radio Control State Machine configuration */

memberdef.name: FREQEST
memberdef.initializer: 0x32 /* FREQEST – Frequency Offset Estimate from demodulator */

memberdef.name: LQI
memberdef.initializer: 0x33 /* LQI – Demodulator estimate for Link Quality */

memberdef.name: MARCSTATE
memberdef.initializer: 0x35 /* MARCSTATE – Main Radio Control State Machine state */

memberdef.name: WORTIME1
memberdef.initializer: 0x36 /* WORTIME1 – High byte of WOR time */

memberdef.name: WORTIME0
memberdef.initializer: 0x37 /* WORTIME0 – Low byte of WOR time */

memberdef.name: PKTSTATUS
memberdef.initializer: 0x38 /* PKTSTATUS – Current GDOx status and packet status */

memberdef.name: VCO_VC_DAC
memberdef.initializer: 0x39 /* VCO_VC_DAC – Current setting from PLL calibration module */

memberdef.name: TXBYTES
memberdef.initializer: 0x3A /* TXBYTES – Underflow and number of bytes */

memberdef.name: RXBYTES
memberdef.initializer: 0x3B /* RXBYTES – Overflow and number of bytes */

memberdef.name: SFSTXON
memberdef.initializer: 0x31 /* SFSTXON - Enable and calibrate frequency synthesizer. */

memberdef.name: SCAL
memberdef.initializer: 0x33 /* SCAL - Calibrate frequency synthesizer and turn it off. */

memberdef.name: SRX
memberdef.initializer: 0x34 /* SRX - Enable RX. Perform calibration if enabled. */

memberdef.name: STX
memberdef.initializer: 0x35 /* STX - Enable TX. If in RX state, only enable TX if CCA passes. */

memberdef.name: SIDLE
memberdef.initializer: 0x36 /* SIDLE - Exit RX / TX, turn off frequency synthesizer. */

memberdef.name: SWOR
memberdef.initializer: 0x38 /* SWOR - Start automatic RX polling sequence (Wake-on-Radio) */

memberdef.name: SPWD
memberdef.initializer: 0x39 /* SPWD - Enter power down mode when CSn goes high. */

memberdef.name: SFRX
memberdef.initializer: 0x3A /* SFRX - Flush the RX FIFO buffer. */

memberdef.name: SFTX
memberdef.initializer: 0x3B /* SFTX - Flush the TX FIFO buffer. */

memberdef.name: SNOP
memberdef.initializer: 0x3D /* SNOP - No operation. Returns status byte. */
